General.Name: Pembangunan Jaya Ancol Tbk
General.Description: PT Pembangunan Jaya Ancol Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manages tourist area, travel show, and lodging areas in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Tourism; Real Estate; and Trading and Services. The company manages entrance gates, recreational parks and beaches, fantasy world, swimming pool, animal shows, and lodging facilities, as well as engages in merchandise selling activities. It also develops, sells, and rents various real estate properties. In addition, the company is involved in souvenirs trading, marine transportation, and restaurant management activities; the purification, management, drainage, supply, and distribution of clean water; and the provision of highway construction and services, and consulting services. PT Pembangunan Jaya Ancol Tbk was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Ecovention Building - Ecopark, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14430
